description: Describes an event tracker. The response includes the trackingId and status of the event tracker. For more information on event trackers, see CreateEventTracker.

parameters.name: eventTrackerArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the event tracker to describe.

nested_items.name: eventTracker
nested_items.description: An object that describes the event tracker.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the event tracker.

nested_items.name: eventTrackerArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the event tracker.

nested_items.name: accountId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account that owns the event tracker.

nested_items.name: trackingId
nested_items.description: The ID of the event tracker. Include this ID in requests to the PutEvents API.

nested_items.name: datasetGroupArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the dataset group that receives the event data.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the event tracker.
CREATE PENDING > CREATE IN_PROGRESS > ACTIVE -or- CREATE FAILED.

nested_items.name: creationDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time (in Unix format) that the event tracker was created.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time (in Unix time) that the event tracker was last updated.
